_header: And suffered for you wounds smart
Subjects: Passion, exhortation to worship by; Virgin Mary, sorrows of
_description: Exhortation to worship by the Passion — ten couplets

BLAdd37787.First Lines:
And suffred for ȝow woundes smertOn hede on fete on hande on
                    herte…
BLAdd37787.Last Lines:
…That biddeth to my sone & meA pater noster with an
                    aue
BLAdd37787.Editions:
Baugh,  Nita Scudder. 
             A Worcestershire Miscellany, compiled by John
                    Northwood, c. 1400, edited from British Museum MS. Add.
                37,787.
         Philadelphia, 1956: 153.
